name: Beholder (itch)
description:
• You'll LIVE in a grim future where privacy is dead and a totalitarian State owns your life!
  • You'll SERVE the State that appointed you a manager of an apartment house!
  • You'll SPY on tenants, peeping and eavesdropping!
  • You'll REPORT on ideological subversions!
  • But will you USE authority to keep within the law?
  • Or will you CHOOSE to pursue your own interests?
  • What will you do when your LIFE depends on the person you must report on?

Now it is YOUR CALL!

Beta version availble for download.

Release date: Fall 2016.

Platforms: PC, MAC

    PC MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows XP/7/8/10
    • Processor: 3 GHZ
    • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
    • Graphics: 512 MB 3D
    • DirectX: Version 9.0c
    • Storage: 500 MB available space

MAC OS Minimum:

  • MAC OSX 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB 3D
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
